title: kopipe
author: kopipe
content: Your XMR for my BTC.If you are not trusted by me (I trust default trust usually but will check you out), you send first. Non-negotiable.Using the Binance BTC/XMR rate.

comments.author: Dabs
comments.body: Hi. We can do it using the method you just told me about.

comments.author: BitSwapNow
comments.body: You can swap BTC for XMR on our service within a few minutes.

comments.author: BenCodie
comments.body: Quote from: BitSwapNow on June 06, 2023, 04:36:02 PMYou can swap BTC for XMR on our service within a few minutes.No one is going to trust a centralized swapping service that not only takes a fee for an altcoin exchange but additionally is operated by someone of your status. The OP clearly said he is not going first if you are not trusted. Sending money to your service is the equivalent of sending money first and hoping for money back next. If OP finds the people he is looked for, then he will do 1 : 1 with them and not face any fee like what he will face when using your service, other than the network fee to send the BTC. I'm not against proposing solutions to services when they are applicable, however this advertisement is not applicable as it does not meet the requirements stated in the OP.

comments.author: kopipe
comments.body: Quote from: Dabs on June 03, 2023, 04:30:34 PMHi. We can do it using the method you just told me about.I just don't know it'll work so am holding out for someone who actually has the XMR.
